short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your new tab experience with KiwiTab extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your New Tab homepage into a sleek, minimalist alternative using KiwiTab, offering immediate access to your favorite websites.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the 'KiwiTab' extension and setting the New Tab to that powered by Microsoft Bing, Terms of Use (https://www.kiwitab.com/terms.html) and Privacy Policy (https://www.kiwitab.com/privacy.html).

KiwiTab simplifies your browsing by providing instant access to Facebook, Amazon, WhatsApp and others.

The AI shortcut to ChatGPT offers instant access to its conversational abilities, making interactions faster and more efficient. This functionality improves the user experience by making it easier to utilize AI for information gathering, creativity, problem-solving, and beyond.

Terms of Use: https://www.kiwitab.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://www.kiwitab.com/privacy.html
Contact Us: https://www.kiwitab.com/contact.html
